item.title: Quick Hits
item.description: Interesting Iranian Op on US Soil So a few days ago the US DOJ just released an indictment of 4 Iranian individuals who conspired to kidnap or coerce Masih Alinejad an American-Iranian human rights activist to come back to Iran. The DOJ press release can be found here and the Masihâ€™s account of the issue via the UAE news site The National is here. First case to my knowledge of something like this happening on US soil against a US citizen.
